content: simple basket by heide petroski a simple basket easy enough for a beginner worked with double strands of yarn for extra stiffness the bottom of the basket is worked in single_crochet and sides in double crochet with side handles for extra detail yarn 100gr worsted weight yarn cascade ecological wool hook size g finsihed size 8 x 4 x 3 tall basket is worked with two strand of yarn held together throughout bottom chain 25 row 1 skip first chain single_crochet in each stich across row 2-18 turn chain one and single_crochet in each stitch across continue working in single_crochet around next three sides of bottom 16 stitches on short edges and 24 stitches on long edge sides round 1 chain 2 double_crochet around bottom going through just the back loop of stitch this makes the turning edge slip_stitch to beginning chain 80 stitches round 2-3 chain 2 double_crochet in each stitch around going through both lopps of the stitch slip_stitch to beginning chain handles round 1 chain 2 double_crochet in the next 28 stitches chain 9 stitches skip next 8 stitches double_crochet in next 32 stitches chain 9 stitches skip next 8 stitches double_crochet in the next 4 stitches slip_stitch to beginning chain round 2 chain 2 double_crochet in each stitch including chain stitches slip_stitch to beginning chain fasten_off
